name: Melting Point (lurlichs)
description:
Melting Point is a first-person Horror survival game where the player is trapped within a dark, decrepit, and freezing hotel with a strange creature who is perpetually on fire. Due to the nature of the location the player needs to utilise this flaming creature to navigate the dark and fend off the cold however as you are literally playing with fire the player must be careful not to be burnt to a crisp.
